reviews.text: Love the sushi and the vibes here  Jasmin is the best! She's so personable and makes the best drinks.
If you're looking for a fun bar, this is it. Amazing staff, amazing drinks. AMAZING atmosphere & views. This is the place to take people out of town if...
You can't find a better cocktail/food menu anywhere else in cbus. Highly recommend the lobster mac and the captain cocktail
